short_summary: Electrical services for project "Replacing of 2 distribution panels and 3 motor control centres"
description: The tender is for electrical services for the replacement of two distribution panels and three motor control centers. The project involves the replacement of all distribution panel and motor control center components with new, modern, quality components that are reliable. The additional details of the service can be found in the contemporary drawings.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Replacing of 2 Distribution Panels and 3 Motor Control Centres
---

#### Title | Titre
---------------- / ----------
Replacing of 2 Distribution Panels and 3 Motor Control Centres | Remplacement de 2 Panneaux de Distribution Electriques et 3 Centres de Demarreur

#### Tender Information
----------------------

*   **Reference Number** | **Numero Reference** : cb-8759-10525213
*   **Solicitation Number** | **Numero Solicitation** : 01B46-23-116
*   **Ppublication Date** | **Date de Publication** : 2023-09-06
*   **Tender Closing Date** | **Date de Clôture Offres** : 2023-10-05T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date** | **Date Début Contrat Prevue** : 2023-10-13
*   **Expected Contract End Date** | **Date Fin Contrat Prevue** : 2024-03-31

#### Project Overview
-------------------

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites proposals from qualified Electrical Contractors to replace two (2) electrical distribution panels and three (3) motor control centres at their facilities in Quebec, Canada. All components will be replaced with modern, reliable, and quality equipment.

#### Project Requirements
---------------------

*   Replace two (2) electrical distribution panels and three (3) motor control centres with new components.
*   Provide electrical services to ensure a smooth transition of operations.

#### Notice Type
----------------

The procurement method chosen is **Competitive - Open Bidding**, and the selection criteria is based on **Lowest Price**. The project is sponsored by the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)** and is open to bids from Canadian companies.

#### Important Contact Information
-------------------------------

*   **Contact Person** : Nicole LeBlanc
*   **Email** : [Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca](mailto:Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca)
*   **Phone** : (506) 378-2956

#### Attachments
--------------

Additional information regarding this project is available for download on the Canada Buy Service's website. Click on the following links to retrieve the files:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8759/01b46-23
